Meta.title: Reforged Equipment
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod添加了三个配方, 让你可以在[枪身加工机]上, 使用[研磨剂], 重新随机装备属性 所有属性只会在比处理前的值更高时才会实际应用, 并且会分别处理每一条属性 (当前版本[砂轮机]的配方似乎有BUG会吞掉抛光物品,所以这里使用[枪身加工机],我不太确定正常抛光会不会吞物品,有人能试一下吗?)
This mod adds three recipes, allowing you to use [polishing powder] on the [barrel processing machine] to reroll the equipment's attributes. Each attribute will only be applied if it is higher than its previous value, and each attribute is processed individually. (Currently, the [grinding whell] recipe seems to have a bug that consumes the polished item, so we use the [barrel processing machine] instead. I'm not sure if normal polishing will consume the item. Can someone test it?)
